Feats-Skill-Survival -- Female Half-Elf Ranger: 2
Strength: 12 (+1) Dexterity: 14 (+2) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 12 (+1)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 1500/2000 Level: 2 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Favored Terrain (Sky): Moves normally through non-magical difficult terrain in the sky
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 2; General: 0; Skill: 1 Selectable Feature Count: Human (Heritage); Ranger (Hunter's Edge); Ranger (Key Ability)
Feats: Cooperative Nature; Experienced Tracker; Favored Terrain (Sky); Forager; Legendary Survivalist; Monster Hunter; Planar Survival; Survey Wildlife; Terrain Expertise (Forest) Ranger Features: Ability Boost (Dexterity); Ability Boosts; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Class Trained (Ranger); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense); Dexterity; Hunt Prey; Hunter's Edge; Outwit; Perception Expert; Ranger Feats; Ranger Key Ability; Ranger Skills; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Skill Feats Acolyte Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Intelligence, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Religion; Scribing Lore); Student Of The Canon Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Elf; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Hunter's Edge: 1 selection
Ranger Feats: 2 selections
Ranger Key Ability: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 1 selections
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and may take elf and half-elf feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +6 (dexterity; trained) Medicine: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Nature: +7 (wisdom; expert) Stealth: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Athletics: +5 (strength; trained) Occultism: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Survival: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Performance: +1 (charisma; untrained) Swamp Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Deception: +1 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained) Thievery: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Diplomacy: +1 (charisma; untrained) River Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) Scribing Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Gnoll; Necril
Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Ranger Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Survival; Choose 6 from any)
Experienced Tracker: Can Track at full Speed, suffering a -5 Survival penalty
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 8 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Hunt Prey: (1) Gives +2 Perception to Seek and +2 Survival to Track a designated creature until next daily prep
Legendary Survivalist: Can survive indefinitely without food and water and endure incredible temperatures without damage
Outwit: +2 Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and Recall Knowledge checks with hunted prey
Planar Survival: Can use Survival to Subsist on different planes and to prevent damage from planar conditions
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival with a -2 penalty to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Terrain Expertise (Forest): +1 Survival in Forest
Combat
Hit Points: 32 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Ranger: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Hunt Prey: (1) Suffers no distance penalty for ranged Strikes in the 2nd range increment vs. a designated creature until next daily prep
Monster Hunter: Can use Recall Knowledge as part of Hunt Prey; critical success gives +1 attack to self and allies on the next attack once per target per day
Outwit: +1 Armor Class vs. hunted prey
Save: Fortitude: +8 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 6 allocated
Legendary Survivalist Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15 and survival rank (currently 2) >= 4
Planar Survival Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 7 and survival rank (currently 2) >= 3
